Study support for candidates

Approved by NZICA, CPA and ACCA, DHA deliver practical, interactive workshops that help candidates pass their exams. Our expert facilitators cover technical content and likely exam questions as well as exam tips and techniques to ensure you're well prepared. For more information, go to prep2pass.co.nz.
 
 
 

Legal document library

Legal document library
Our latest partner is Net Lawman; provider of arguably the largest and most credible libraries of online New Zealand legal documents. Over time we shall make available 137 business contracts and agreements for companies, partnerships and sole traders and documents covering personal and family law. Whether your client wants to develop a website, sell services or protect an idea, there is a document for the purpose. Click here >>>
 
 
 
 

Let us market for you

Confidential white labelled client newsletters
Do you produce quality newsletters your clients will positively receive? If not, put quite simply, you should.

"Proper" newsletters send a message that your practice is of substance and depth that warrants their loyalty to you. This will build an intangible value that in time can turn into tangible value demonstrated by their longevity tenure and their acceptance to small fee increases over time.

Free to members, we can send news worthy credible monthly client newsletters fully branded your with logo and contact details direct to your client or to you to on-forward. Click here >>>
